column2: This war, this opportunity to prove my mettle in combat, has opened my eyes to my true potential as a warrior. My personal combat skills are improving...
column6: En esta guerra he tenido ocasión de probarme en combate y he descubierto mi auténtico potencial. Mi habilidad marcial está mejorando...

column2: May [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] guide my heart, hand, and steel.
column6: Que [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] guíe mi corazón, mi mano y mi acero.

column2: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! begins advancement of [Root.GetHerHis] personal combat skills...\n
column6: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! comienza a mejorar su habilidad marcial...\n

column2: I've learned many lessons from this battle. Aside from application of the theoretical tactics my mentors taught me as a boy, I've learned to deftly isolate an opponent in the thick of the front, bring all my focus and concentration to bear upon him, and then, within but a few rounds of melee, swiftly execute him. I'm proud of my clear progression into a greater warrior.
column6: Aprendí mucho de esta batalla. Aparte de la aplicación de las tácticas que me enseñaron mis mentores, he aprendido a aislar a mi oponente en el fragor de la batalla, poner toda mi atención y concentración en abatirle y al fin, con golpes certeros acabar con él. Estoy orgulloso de mi progreso como gran guerrero.

column2: Still, I've more lessons to learn.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! continues advancement of [Root.GetHerHis] personal combat skills...\n
column6: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! continúa el avance en su habilidad marcial\n

column2: I will remember this battle in its finest detail until the end of my days. [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] guided my sword into the hearts of a countless number of my foes, raising cheers and battle-cries from my surrounding men as I cut a path through the enemy. My mastery of personal combat has come a long way. Apparently, I am not the only one to think so.
column6: Recordaré hasta el más mínimo detalle de esta batalla hasta el final de mis días. [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] guió mi espada hasta el corazón de mis enemigos, alzando vítores y gritos de batalla entre mis hombres mientras abría paso con mi espada. Mi maestría en combate no tiene parangón. Aparentemente, no soy el único que lo piensa.

column2: I'm now recognized as a trained fighter.
column6: Ahora se me reconoce como luchador.

column2: I'm now reknowned as skilled fighter.
column6: Ahora soy un luchador de renombre.

column2: I now command the respect of an elite warrior.
column6: Ahora se me respeta como guerrero de élite.

column2: My combat victory against [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] was an insightful challenge to my own tactics. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] moved differently than I've come to expect and demonstrated a new, effective combat style to me. At no point was my victory certain, but I learned from [FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] and finally defeated [FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun]. Certainly, I'm now a finer warrior.
column6: Mi victoria sobre [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] ha sido un desafío a mis tácticas. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] me sorprendió con nuevos movimientos y un estilo de combate eficaz. En ningún momento estuve seguro de ganar, pero aprendí de [FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] y conseguí derrotarle. Ahora soy un guerrero más diestro.

column2: I'm recognized as a warrior in my own right now.
column6: Ahora soy reconocido como guerrero por derecho propio.

column2: I'm now recognized as a trained fighter.
column6: Ahora se me reconoce como luchador.

column2: I'm now reknowned as skilled fighter.
column6: Ahora soy un luchador de renombre.

column2: I now command the respect of an elite warrior.
column6: Ahora se me respeta como guerrero de élite.

column6: Mi [GetFromRelation], [From.GetBestName], ganó experiencia de un combate impulsivo a la edad de [From.GetAgeYears] con la ambición [From.GetAmbition] (Martial: [From.GetMartial]).

column2: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetBestName], just earned XP from a combat impulse at the age of [From.GetAgeYears] (Martial: [From.GetMartial]).

column6: Mi [GetFromRelation], [From.GetBestName], venció en un duelo contra [FromFrom.GetBestName] y logró experiencia (Ambition: [From.GetAmbition]).

column2: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetBestName], was victorious in a duel against [FromFrom.GetBestName] but did not earn any XP (Ambition: [From.GetAmbition]).
column6: Mi [GetFromRelation], [From.GetBestName], venció en un duelo contra [FromFrom.GetBestName] pero no logró experiencia (Ambition: [From.GetAmbition]).
Mi [GetFromRelation], [From.GetBestName], mejoró su talento en combate (Ambition: [From.GetAmbition]).
Hmm... ahora es un luchador torpe.

column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName] has no education in the art of personal combat and wants to change that through combat experience.
column6: [This.GetTitledFirstName] no ha sido educado en las artes marciales y quiere cambiar las cosas ganando experiencia en combate.

column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName] has a meager education in the art of personal combat and wants to change that through combat experience.
column6: [This.GetTitledFirstName] tiene escasa formación en las artes marciales y quiere mejorar ganando experiencia en combate.

column2: While [This.GetTitledFirstName] is already well-trained in personal combat, [This.GetSheHe]'d like to take [This.GetHerHis] skills to the next level through experience in the field.
column6: Aunque [This.GetTitledFirstName] está bien entrenado en las artes marciales, le gustaría alcanzar más nivel ganando experiencia en combate.

column2: While many already consider [This.GetTitledFirstName] to be one of the more skilled fighters in the realm, [This.GetSheHe] desires true mastery of [This.GetHerHis] art, and no better way to attain such heights exists than through experience in the field.
column6: Aunque muchos consideran a [This.GetTitledFirstName] uno de los mejores luchadores del reino, a [This.GetSheHe] le gustaría llegar a ser un maestro en el arte de la guerra, y qué mejor modo que ganando experiencia en combate.

column6: Gloria Dei!\nWe have conquered Constantinople from the heretic Byzantines and now a Catholic Emperor will rule over the former eastern part of the Roman Empire.

column2: This menu will allow you to change the name of various realms, such as the Byzantine Empire. Note that the last option is always the default.

This decision/event will allow you to choose what name the Byzantine Empire is known by in the game. You can always change it to something else, or set it back to the default “Byzantine Empire” if you change your mind. If you want to reset, select the last option, “Byzantine Empire (default)”.
If you wish to see the earlier options, temporarily choose one of the following, then activate the “Choose Realm Names” decision again.

This decision/event will allow you to choose what name  Rum is known by in the game. You can always change it to something else, or set it back to the default “Rum” if you change your mind. If you want to reset, select the last option, “Rum (default)”.

This decision/event will allow you to choose what name Romania (Latin Empire in vanilla) is known by in the game. You can always change it to something else, or set it back to the default “Romania” if you change your mind. If you want to reset, select the last option, “Latin Empire (vanilla default)”.Bear in mind the adjective for it still will be

This decision/event will allow you to choose what name the Roman Empire is known by in the game. You can always change it to something else, or set it back to the default “Roman Empire” if you change your mind. If you want to reset, select the last option, “Roman Empire (default)”.

column1: ########From this mod (plus a copypasta from PB)

column2: This character has saved Byzantium, that is, Constantinople from foreign invaders.
This character rules in Constantinople, fighting greeks, turks and other foreign invaders, protecting the city from infidels and heretics.
Call the Varangian Guard to protect Constantinople once again.
Create a sucessor empire of the Byzantine Empire.
Create a sucessor empire of the Byzantine Empire.
The Rise and Fall of Rome
The Byzantine Empire, though it survives, is a mockery of its former glory. Since it has been reduced to such size and since we rule Constantinople, none question our claim to the Roman Empire.

To my former liege, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. Not only you lost the throne of Constantinople, you lost the Varangian Guard too, I'll join the ruler of Constantinople.\nMy best regards, [From.GetBestName].

To my new liege, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. Me and the Varangian Guard will be your personal guard from now on, while you're the ruler of Constantinople, as my former liege lost it to you.\nMy best regards, [From.GetBestName].
The Varangian Guard moves to your court.
A talented eunuch has been brought before my attention. He is currently one of the many eunuchs serving at your court, but perhaps I could make use of his skills.
I don't need another source of court intrigue.
Now that we have managed to retake all of Iconium our rightful rule of all of Anatolia is once more recognized.
Constantinople is now under true Roman administration, saved from the menace of turks or filthy catholic pretenders of Rome
Constantinople is now under true Roman administration, saved from the menace of turks or filthy catholic pretenders of Rome
We have conquered the lands of the Empire of Trebizond!
Change title to the Empire of Trebizond
Byzantium is no more, Constantinople has fallen, we must accept the inheritance of the Roman Empire to ourselves.
We have conquered all de jure territory of the Empire of Trebizond, the claimants of our throne!
Byzantium is no more, Constantinople has fallen, we must accept the inheritance of the Roman Empire to ourselves.
An army of loyalist of the Empire appears at Constantinople.\n
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. I'm joining Byzantium, so we can unite the Roman Empire.\nYour new vassal, [From.GetBestName].

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. I have saved Byzantium from the brink of destruction and I'm sending you this letter to invite you to become my vassal so the Empire can get stronger.\nSincerely, [From.GetBestName],Ruler of Constantinople.
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. I'm not joining this pretentious Roman-wannabe empire of yours.\nSincerely, [From.GetBestName].

column2: The Novgorodian Veche have unanimously removed their Rurikovich prince, declaring a new Republic governed by the Veche itself as well as the merchantile and ecclesiastical factions. Many of the Rurikids are outraged, many of them claiming the Principality as theirs by right. The Republic is wary of this threat to its existence, but also looks to the tribal lands to its East and West for possible expansion routes

The Boyars and merchants of the great city of Novgorod have unanimously rejected the rule of feudal princes. They have declared a new government, to be ruled by the collective will of the Veche and headed by the Posadnik of Novgorod.

The merchants running one of your Trade Posts have abandoned their allegiance to your dynasty! They now serve one of the patrician families in the newly born Novgorod Republic, claiming that the upstart Republic affords them better opportunities to profit.
column3: Les marchands ayant la charge d'un de vos comptoirs ont rompu leur allégeance envers votre dynastie ! Ils sont à présent au service d'un des familles patriciennes de la naissante Hanse, prétendant que cette ambitieuse ligue commerciale leur offre de meilleures opportunités.
column4: Die Kaufleute, die einen Ihrer Handelsposten leiten, haben Ihrer Dynastie die Gefolgschaft aufgekündigt! Sie arbeiten jetzt für eine der Patrizierfamilien in der neu geborenen Hanse, mit der Behauptung, dass dieses Handelsbündnis von Emporkömmlingen ihnen bessere Möglichkeiten bietet, zu profitieren.
column6: ¡Los mercaderes que dirigen uno de tus puestos de comercio han terminado su relación con tu familia! Ahora sirven a la recién creada Hansa, con la excusa de que la nueva liga comercial les permite mayores oportunidades de beneficios.

column2: The Great Schism saw the Christian Church divided into two branches, but if all five of the episcopal sees of the Pentarchy could be restored under our rule to the Catholic faith, there may be a chance to finally reunite Christendom.
column3: L'Église chrétienne s'est vu divisée en deux lignées par le Grand Schisme, mais si la totalité des cinq sièges épiscopaux de la Pentarchie peuvent être rétablis sous le règne de Rome et de la foi orthodoxe, il y a peut-être une chance de réunir enfin la C
column4: Das Große Schisma sah die christliche Kirche in zwei Teile zerfallen, doch wenn alle fünf episkopalen Arme der Pentarchie wieder unter römischer Herrschaft und in orthodoxem Glauben vereint sind, besteht eine Chance, das Christentum wieder zu vereinen.
column6: El Gran Cisma dividió la Iglesia Cristiana en dos ramas, pero si las cinco sedes episcopales de la Pentarquía pueden ser recuperadas bajo el dominio romano y la fe ortodoxa, podría haber una oportunidad de reunir finalmente la cristiandad.

column2: The Great Schism is mended and Christendom reunited.
column3: Le Grand Schisme est terminé et toutes les églises chrétiennes sont réunies.
column4: Das Große Schisma wurde geheilt und das Christentum wieder vereint.
column6: El Gran Cisma terminó y se reunió cristiandad.

column2: At last the Great Schism between the Western Catholic Church and the Eastern Orthodox Church has been mended. With the spread of Catholicism and the reunification of the Pentarchy, including the vital episcopal see of Constantinople, the Orthodox faith now holds little sway over the people of Europe. There will be those who still cling to it, but they will be few in number and the Pentarchy can once more claim universal rule over all of Christendom.
column3: Enfin le Grand Schisme entre l'Église catholique d'Occident et l'Église orthodoxe d'Orient est terminé. Avec l'expansion de l'orthodoxie et la réunification de la Pentarchie, incluant l'important siège épiscopal de Rome, la foi catholique n'a plus la même
column4: Endlich wurde das Große Schisma zwischen der westlichen katholischen Kirche und der östlichen orthodoxen Kirche geheilt. Mit der Ausbreitung der Rechtgläubigkeit und der Wiedervereinigung der Pentarchie, unter Einbindung aller fünf Episkopale Roms, hat de
column6: Por fin, el Gran Cisma entre la Iglesia Católica Occidental y la Iglesia Ortodoxa Oriental ha sido reparado. Con la expansión de la Ortodoxia y la reunificación de la Pentarquía, incluida la vital sede episcopal de Roma, la fe católica tiene ahora poca influencia sobre la gente en Europa. Habrá quienes todavía se aferren a ella, pero serán pocos en número y la  Pentarquía puede reclamar una vez más el dominio universal sobre toda la cristiandad.

column2: If that's the way the wind is blowing...
column3: Si c'est ainsi que le vent souffle...
column6: Parece que es por donde sopla el viento ...

column2: I will never give up my faith!
column3: Jamais je ne renierai ma foi !
column4: Ich werde meinen Glauben niemals aufgeben!

column2: With the now under Catholic control, the Patriarchate of Antioch has been properly restored as one of the episcopal sees of the Pentarchy in the Western Catholic Church. It was originally founded by Saint Peter the Apostle, who is regarded as the first Pope by the Western Catholic Church.
column3: Comme la cité est de nouveau sous le contrôle de l'Empire romain d'Orient, le Patriarcat d'Antioche a formellement été restitué à l'un des sièges épiscopaux de la Pentarchie au sein de l'Église orthodoxe orientale. Il a été fondé à l'origine par Saint Pie
column4: Nun da die Stadt erneut unter der Kontrolle Ost-Roms ist, wurde das Patriarchat von Antiochien, als einer der bischöflichen Arme der Pentarchie in der Orthodoxen Kirche des Ostens, wiederhergestellt. Es wurde ursprünglich vom Heiligen Apostel Petrus gegrü
column6: Con la ciudad de nuevo bajo el control romano del este, el Patriarcado de Antioquía ha sido debidamente reinstaurado como una de las sedes episcopales de la Pentarquía en la Iglesia Ortodoxa Oriental, la cual fue originalmente fundada por San Pedro Apóstol, considerado el primer Papa de la Iglesia católica occidental.

column2: With the city now under Catholic control, the Patriarchate of Jerusalem has been properly restored as one of the episcopal sees of the Pentarchy in the Western Catholic Church. It was originally founded by Saint James the Just, who was made head of the Church in Jerusalem soon after the death of Jesus.
column3: Comme la cité est de nouveau sous le contrôle de l'Empire romain d'Orient, le Patriarcat de Jérusalem a formellement été restitué à l'un des sièges épiscopaux de la Pentarchie au sein de l'Église orthodoxe orientale. Il a été fondé à l'origine par Saint J
column4: Nun da die Stadt erneut unter der Kontrolle Ost-Roms ist, wurde das Patriarchat von Jerusalem, als einer der bischöflichen Arme der Pentarchie in der Orthodoxen Kirche des Ostens, wiederhergestellt. Es wurde ursprünglich vom Heiligen Jakobus, dem Gerechte
column6: Con la ciudad de nuevo bajo el control romano del este, el Patriarcado de Jerusalén ha sido debidamente reinstaurado como una de las sedes episcopales de la Pentarquía en la Iglesia Ortodoxa Oriental, la cual fue originalmente fundada por Santiago el Justo, que fue nombrado jefe de la Iglesia en Jerusalén poco después de la  muerte de Jesús.

column2: With the city now under Catholic control, the Patriarchate of Alexandria has been properly restored as one of the episcopal sees of the Pentarchy in the Western Catholic Church. It was originally founded by Saint Mark the Evangelist, who became Alexandria's first patriarch.
column3: Comme la cité est de nouveau sous le contrôle de l'Empire romain d'Orient, le Patriarcat d'Alexandrie a formellement été restitué à l'un des sièges épiscopaux de la Pentarchie au sein de l'Église orthodoxe orientale. Il a été fondé à l'origine par Saint M
column4: Nun da die Stadt erneut unter der Kontrolle Ost-Roms ist, wurde das Patriarchat von Alexandrien, als einer der bischöflichen Arme der Pentarchie in der Orthodoxen Kirche des Ostens, wiederhergestellt. Es wurde ursprünglich vom Heiligen Evangelist Markus g
column6: Con la ciudad de nuevo bajo el control romano del este, el Patriarcado de Alejandría ha sido debidamente reinstaurado como una de las sedes episcopales de la Pentarquía en la Iglesia Ortodoxa Oriental, que originalmente fue fundada por San Marcos Evangelista, el primer patriarca de Alejandría.

column2: With the city now under Catholic control, the Patriarchate of Constantinople has been properly restored as one of the episcopal sees of the Pentarchy in the Western Catholic Church. If all five historical patriarchates are returned to the Pentarchy, the Great Schism between the Eastern and Western churches may finally be mended.
column3: Comme la cité est de nouveau sous le contrôle de l'Empire romain d'Orient, le Patriarcat de Rome a formellement été restitué à l'un des sièges épiscopaux de la Pentarchie au sein de l'Église orthodoxe orientale. Si les cinq patriarcats historiques sont re
column4: Nun da die Stadt erneut unter der Kontrolle Ost-Roms ist, wurde das Patriarchat Roms, als einer der bischöflichen Arme der Pentarchie in der Orthodoxen Kirche des Ostens, wiederhergestellt. Wenn alle fünf Patriarchate wieder der Pentarchie zugehörig sind,
column6: Con la ciudad de nuevo bajo el control romano del este, el Patriarcado de Roma ha sido debidamente reinstaurado como una de las sedes episcopales de la Pentarquía en la Iglesia Ortodoxa Oriental. Si los cinco patriarcados históricos son devueltos a la Pentarquía, el Gran Cisma entre las iglesias orientales y occidentales finalmente podrá ser reparado.
